original_title: NPP secures 12 seats, SJB secures 3 in Kurunegala
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Kurunegala District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 69% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 651,476 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 189,394 votes (20.22%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 12 seats in the district while the SJB has won 3 seats in the district.
